author: jbonofre
msg: [SM-2056] Upgrade to JAXB 2.2 and package JAXB API in the container lib.

author: not
msg: ARIES-577 Add support for ext:default on a reference element so if the availability is optional you
can wire to a default implementation if no service is present, making everything simple to write
optional services where you want a default implementation that can be overridden.
